module.name: zipper

descr.p: zipper implements zip compression/decompression compatible with the popular .ZIP format. The zip file format is documented at:
http://www.pkware.com/documents/casestudies/APPNOTE.TXT.
The Pascal conversion of the standard zlib library was implemented by Jacques Nomssi Nzali. It is used in the FCL to implement the TCompressionStream class.

element.name: END_OF_CENTRAL_DIR_SIGNATURE
element.short: Marker specifying end of directory within zip file.

element.name: ZIP64_END_OF_CENTRAL_DIR_SIGNATURE
element.short: Marker specifying end of the directory within a 64-bit zip file.

element.name: LOCAL_FILE_HEADER_SIGNATURE
element.short: Marker specifying a file entry within the zip file.
element.descr: Denotes beginning of a file header within the zip file. A file header follows this marker, followed by the file data proper.

element.name: CENTRAL_FILE_HEADER_SIGNATURE
element.short: Marker specifying a file entry within the zip directory.
element.descr: Denotes beginning of a file entry inside the zip directory. A file header follows this marker.

element.name: EFS_LANGUAGE_ENCODING_FLAG
element.short: Language encoding flag (EFS). When set the file name and comment fields must use UTF-8 encoding.

element.name: Local_File_Header_Type
element.short: Record structure containing local file header.

element.name: Local_File_Header_Type.Signature
element.short: Signature for local file header within zip file.

element.name: Local_File_Header_Type.Extract_Version_Reqd
element.short: Minimum zip version needed to extract.

element.name: Local_File_Header_Type.Bit_Flag
element.descr: Please see zip format documentation for details.

element.name: Local_File_Header_Type.Crc32
element.descr: CRC 32 value for a file, presumably containing the CRC 32 checksum of file data.

element.name: Local_File_Header_Type.Compressed_Size
element.short: Size in bytes of compressed file.

element.name: Local_File_Header_Type.Uncompressed_Size
element.short: Size in bytes of decompressed file.

descr.p: Length of extra field in local file header. An extra field contains program-specific information and should be ignored if the extra field is not supported.

element.name: Extensible_Data_Field_Header_Type
element.descr: Beginning of extra field. Occurs after the local file header and after the central directory header.

descr.p: $0001 (ZIP64_HEADER_ID) Zip64 extended information extra field. $0009 OS/2: extended attributes. $000a NTFS: (Win32 really). $000d UNIX: uid, gid etc.
Size of following field data. Field data should follow the extensible header type information.
Packed Record occurs after Extensible_Data_Field_Header_Type. Overrides the Local and Central Directory data. Stored in extra field.

element.name: Zip64_Extended_Info_Field_Type.Original_Size
element.descr: Uncompressed file size.

element.name: Zip64_Extended_Info_Field_Type.Compressed_Size
element.descr: Compressed data size.

element.name: Zip64_Extended_Info_Field_Type.Relative_Hdr_Offset
element.short: Offset to the local header record.
element.descr: Offset to the local header record.

element.name: Zip64_Extended_Info_Field_Type.Disk_Start_Number
element.short: Disk number where this file starts.
element.descr: Disk number where this file starts.

element.name: Central_File_Header_Type
element.short: Record structure containing central file header.
element.descr: This record contains the structure for a file header within the central directory.

element.name: Central_File_Header_Type.MadeBy_Version
element.short: Zip version that compressed the file.

element.name: Central_File_Header_Type.Extract_Version_Reqd
element.short: Zip version needed to extract file.

element.name: Central_File_Header_Type.Bit_Flag
element.short: Central file general purpose bit flag.
element.descr: General purpose flag for a file entry in the central directory.

element.name: Central_File_Header_Type.Compress_Method
element.descr: Method used to compress the file

element.name: Central_File_Header_Type.Extra_Field_Length
element.descr: Length of extra field (or 0 if none). An extra field contains program-specific information and should be ignored if the extra field is not supported.

element.name: Central_File_Header_Type.File_Comment_Length
element.descr: Length of file comment (or 0 if none).

element.name: End_of_Central_Dir_Type
element.short: Record storing end of central directory information.

descr.p: The end of central directory is placed at the end of the zip file. Note that the end of central directory record is distinct from the Zip64 end of central directory record and zip64 end of central directory locator, which precede the end of central directory, if implemented.

element.name: End_of_Central_Dir_Type.Central_Dir_Start_Disk
element.short: Number of the disk with the start of the central directory.

element.name: End_of_Central_Dir_Type.Entries_This_Disk
element.short: Total number of entries in the central directory in this disk.

element.name: End_of_Central_Dir_Type.Total_Entries
element.short: Total number of entries in the central directory.

element.name: End_of_Central_Dir_Type.Start_Disk_Offset
element.short: Offset of the start of the central directory against the starting disk number.

element.name: End_of_Central_Dir_Type.ZipFile_Comment_Length
element.short: Length of the zip comment field.
element.descr: Denotes the length of the comment for the entire zip file (or 0 if no comment).

module.element: Record at end of central directory. This record appears at the end of the central directory.

element.name: Zip64_End_of_Central_Dir_type.Entries_This_Disk
element.short: Number of entries on this disk.

element.name: Zip64_End_of_Central_Dir_Locator_type
element.descr: Comes after the Zip64_End_of_Central_Dir_type.

element.name: Zip64_End_of_Central_Dir_Locator_type.Zip64_EOCD_Start_Disk
element.short: Starting disk number for Zip64 End of Central Directory record.

element.name: Zip64_End_of_Central_Dir_Locator_type.Central_Dir_Zip64_EOCD_Offset
element.short: Offset of Zip64 End of Central Directory record.

element.name: Zip64_End_of_Central_Dir_Locator_type.Total_Disks
element.short: Total number of disks (contained in zip).

element.name: Crc_32_Tab
element.descr: Table used in determining CRC-32 values. There are various CRC-32 algorithms in use; please refer to the ZIP file format specifications for details.

element.name: TProgressEvent
element.short: Event procedure for capturing compression/decompression progress.

element.name: TProgressEventEx
element.short: Specifies an event handler signalled to indicate compression/decompression progress.

descr.p: TProgressEventEx is an object procedure which implements an event handler signalled to indicate compression/decompression progress. It is very similar to TProgressEvent, but provides separate values for the cumulative number of bytes handled and the total number of bytes to be processed.
TProgressEventEx is the type used to implement the OnProgressEx property in TDeCompressor and TUnZipper.

element.name: TProgressEventEx.ATotPos
element.short: Cumulative number of bytes handled in the caller.

element.name: TProgressEventEx.ATotSize
element.short: Total number of bytes to be processed in the caller.

element.name: TOnEndOfFileEvent
element.short: Event procedure for an end of file (de)compression event.

element.name: TOnEndOfFileEvent.Ratio
element.short: Ratio of total operation (compression/decompression) that is completed.

element.name: TOnStartFileEvent
element.short: Event procedure for a start of file (de)compression event.

element.name: TOnStartFileEvent.AFileName
element.short: File name of file to be processed.

element.name: TCompressor
element.descr: This object compresses a stream into a compressed zip stream.

element.name: TCompressor.FBufferSize
element.short: Size of buffer used for compression.

element.name: TCompressor.Create.AInFile
element.short: Input file that will be compressed.

element.name: TCompressor.Compress
element.short: Compresses input stream to output stream.

element.name: TCompressor.ZipVersionReqd
element.short: ZIP version required in the method.
element.descr: Abstract virtual class function. Must be implemented in a descendent class.

element.name: TCompressor.ZipVersionReqd.Result
element.short: Word type with the required ZIP version.

element.name: TCompressor.ZipBitFlag
element.descr: Abstract virtual function. Must be implemented in a descendent class.

element.name: TCompressor.Terminate
element.short: Halts the compressor by setting the Terminated property to True.

element.name: TCompressor.BufferSize
element.short: Size of the buffer used for compression.

descr.p: BufferSize is a read-only LongWord property with the size of the buffer used for compression. The property is set to the value passed as an argument to the Create constructor.

BufferSize is used in the Compress method (in descendent classes) to allocate a pointer to a memory block with the required size. It also determines the read size used when processing an input file or stream.

element.name: TCompressor.OnPercent
element.short: Threshold percentage which triggers an OnProgress update.

element.name: TCompressor.OnProgress
element.short: Event handler signalled to indicate the completion percentage for the compressor.

element.name: TCompressor.Crc32Val
element.descr: Running CRC32 value used when writing zip header.

element.name: TCompressor.Terminated
element.short: Set to True when the Terminate method is called.

element.name: TDeCompressor
element.descr: This object decompresses a compressed zip stream.

element.name: TDeCompressor.FCrc32Val
element.descr: CRC32 value; used for checking zip file integrity.

element.name: TDeCompressor.Create.ABufSize
element.short: Size of buffer used in decompression.

element.name: TDeCompressor.Terminate
element.short: Halts decompression and sets Terminated to True.

element.name: TDeCompressor.BufferSize
element.short: Size of buffer used in decompression.

element.name: TDeCompressor.OnProgressEx
element.short: Event handler signalled to indicate progress using processed and total byte counts.

element.name: TDeCompressor.Crc32Val
element.short: Running CRC32 value used for verifying zip file integrity.

element.name: TDeCompressor.Terminated
element.short: Set to True when the Terminate method is called.

element.name: TABLESIZE
element.short: Size for the code table used in LZW compression.

element.name: FIRSTENTRY
element.short: Offset of First entry in table.

element.name: CodeArray
element.descr: Array definition for

element.name: TablePtr
element.descr: Pointer to

element.name: FreeListPtr
element.descr: Pointer to

element.name: FreeListArray
element.descr: Helper type in decoding the zip file.

element.name: BufPtr
element.short: Implement the output buffer in TShrinker.

descr.p: Alias for the PByte type. Used to implement the output buffer in TShrinker.

element.name: TShrinker
element.short: Child of TCompressor that implements the Shrink compression method.
element.descr: TShrinker implements the LZW lossless data compression algorithm created by Abraham Lempel, Jacob Ziv, and Terry Welch also known as "shrink" compression.

element.name: TShrinker.Create.AInFile
element.short: Stream with the input processed in the class instance.

element.name: TShrinker.Create.AOutFile
element.short: Stream where the compressed values are written.

element.name: TShrinker.Create.ABufSize
element.short: Size of the buffer used to read and process values from the input stream.

element.name: TShrinker.Compress
element.short: Compresses input values using LZW (shrink) compression.

descr.p: Initializes the code table used for LZW compression. Processes buffer-size chunks from the input stream and calls the private Shrink method to generate values written to the output stream.

element.name: TDeflater
element.short: Child of TCompressor that implements the Deflate compression method.

descr.p: Create is the overridden constructor for the class instance, and calls the inherited method on entry. Create sets the default value for the CompressionLevel property to clNone.

element.name: TDeflater.Create.AInFile
element.short: Stream with the input values compressed in the class instance.

element.name: TDeflater.Create.AOutFile
element.short: Stream with the output values after compression using the Deflate algorithm.

element.name: TDeflater.Create.ABufSize
element.short: Buffer size used to read and process values from the input stream.

element.name: TDeflater.Compress
element.short: Performs compression using the Deflate algorithm.

descr.p: Creates a temporary TCompressionStream instance using the compression level specified in the CompressLevel property. Compress signals the OnProgress event handler (when assigned) when the number of bytes representing the OnPercent threshold are processed in the method.

element.name: TDeflater.CompressionLevel
element.short: Indicates the compression level applied in the Compress method.

descr.p: CompressionLevel is a TCompressionLevel property which Indicates the compression level applied in the Compress method. Values include:

dl.dd: Do not use compression, just copy data.
Use the fast (but less) compression.
Use the default compression. dd
Use the maximum compression.

element.name: TInflater
element.short: Child of TDeCompressor that implements the Inflate decompression method.

element.name: TInflater.Create.AInFile
element.short: Stream with the compressed content processed in the class instance.

element.name: TInflater.Create.AOutFile
element.short: Stream where the de-compressed content is stored.

element.name: TInflater.Create.ABufSize
element.short: Buffer size used to read and process compressed content.

element.name: TInflater.DeCompress
element.short: Removes compression applied using the deflate algorithm.

element.name: TZipFileEntry
element.short: Represents a file or directory added to a .ZIP file.

descr.p: TZipFileEntry is a TCollectionItem descendant which represents a file or directory added to a .ZIP file archive. TZipFileEntry is the type used for items in the Entries property in the TZipFileEntries collection.
TZipFileEntry provides properties with metadata for the file or directory, including:

dl.dd: Name of the file or directory in the .ZIP archive.
Name of the file or directory in the .ZIP archive using UTF-8 encoding.
Name of the file or directory on the local file system.
Name of the file or directory using UTF-8 encoding.
Size of the compressed file or directory in the .ZIP archive.
The timestamp for file or directory in the .ZIP archive.
Indicates the operating system device type / file system where the file or directory originated.
File attributes for the entry.
Compression level applied to the content in the .ZIP archive.
TStream instance with the content for the entry.

descr.p: Use IsDirectory to determine if the entry represents a directory.
Use IsLink to determine if the entry is a symbolic link on the local file system.
Create is the overridden constructor for the class instance. Create sets the default values for properties, including:

dl.dd: Sets to the current date and time for the local computer.
Set to OS_UNIX for UNIX-like environments, or OS_VFAT for all others.
Set to 0 (no attributes).
Set to clDefault.

descr.p: Create calls the inherited constructor prior to exiting from the method.

element.name: TZipFileEntry.Create.ACollection
element.short: Collection which owns the class instance.

element.name: TZipFileEntry.IsDirectory
element.short: True if the entry is a directory on the local file system.

element.name: TZipFileEntry.IsDirectory.Result
element.short: True if the entry is a directory on the local file system.

element.name: TZipFileEntry.IsLink
element.short: True if the directory is a symbolic link on the local file system.

element.name: TZipFileEntry.IsLink.Result
element.short: True if the directory is a symbolic link on the local file system.

element.name: TZipFileEntry.Assign
element.short: Copies property values from the specified persistent object.

element.name: TZipFileEntry.Assign.Source
element.short: Persistent object with the values copied in the method.

element.name: TZipFileEntry.Stream
element.short: Stream with the content for the entry.

element.name: TZipFileEntry.ArchiveFileName
element.short: Name of the file or directory in the .ZIP archive.

element.name: TZipFileEntry. UTF8ArchiveFileName
element.short: Name of the file or directory in the .ZIP archive using UTF-8 encoding.

element.name: TZipFileEntry.DiskFileName
element.short: Name of the file or directory on the local file system.

element.name: TZipFileEntry.UTF8DiskFileName
element.short: Name of the file or directory on the local file system using UTF-8 encoding.

element.name: TZipFileEntry.Size
element.short: Size of the compressed content for the file or directory.

element.name: TZipFileEntry.DateTime
element.short: Timestamp for the file or directory in the .ZIP archive.

element.name: TZipFileEntry.OS
element.descr: Currently either OS_UNIX (if UNIX is defined) or OS_FAT.

element.name: TZipFileEntry.Attributes
element.short: File attributes for the file or directory.

element.name: TZipFileEntry.CompressionLevel
element.short: Compression level applied to the content stored in the .ZIP archive.

element.name: TZipFileEntries
element.short: Collection used to store information about files and directories in the .zip archive.

descr.p: TZipFileEntries is a TCollection descendant which provides support for using TZipFileEntry instances as the Items in the collection. It provides an indexed Entries property used to access the TZipFileEntry instances in the collection, and serves as the default property for enumerator access.
TZipFileEntries is the type used to implement the Entries property in TZipper.

AddFileEntry adds a file or directory to the list of entries that will be written out in the .zip file. AddFileEntry calls the Add method to create the new collection item, and casts it the TZipFileEntry type used in TZipFileEntries.
Values passed as arguments to the overloaded variants are stored in the corresponding properties in the TZipFileEntry instance.
The return value is the TZipFileEntry instance added to the collection.

element.name: TZipFileEntries.AddFileEntry.Result
element.short: Collection item added in the method.

element.name: TZipFileEntries.AddFileEntry.AStream
element.short: Stream with the content for the zip file entry.

element.name: TZipFileEntries.AddFileEntry.ADiskFileName
element.short: Name of the file or directory on the local file system.

element.name: TZipFileEntries.AddFileEntry.AArchiveFileName
element.short: Name used for the file or directory in the .ZIP archive.

element.name: TZipFileEntries.AddFileEntries
element.short: Adds TZipFileEntry instances in the collection for the file names in List.

descr.p: AddFileEntries is a method used to add a list of files names to the collection. List contains the file names added in the method. AddFileEntries iterates over the string values in List, and calls the AddFileEntry method to create new items in the collection.

element.name: TZipFileEntries.AddFileEntries.List
element.short: TStrings instance with the list of file names added to the collection.

descr.p: Entries is an indexed TZipFileEntry property which provides indexed access to the Items in the collection by their ordinal position. The item values are cast to the TZipFileEntry type used in TZipFileEntries.
Entries is the default property in TZipFileEntries, and allows an enumerator to be used to access the TZipFileEntry values in the collection.

element.name: TZipper.ZipAllFiles
element.short: Zips all files in object and writes zip to disk.

descr.p: This procedure zips up all files in the object and writes the resulting zip file to disk.
An example of using this procedure:

element.name: TZipper.SaveToFile
element.short: Saves the archive to a file with a new name.
element.descr: Saves a .ZIP file with a new name.

element.name: TZipper.SaveToStream
element.short: Save the archive to a stream.

element.name: TZipper.SaveToStream.AStream
element.short: Stream to save the archive to.

element.name: TZipper.ZipFile
element.short: Zip one file to a zip file.
element.descr: Zips the specified files into a zip with the name in AFileName.

element.name: TZipper.ZipFile.aFileToBeZipped
element.short: File on disk that must be zipped.

element.name: TZipper.ZipFile.AZipFileName
element.short: The filename of the zip archive file.

element.name: TZipper.ZipFiles
element.short: Zip multiple files into an archive.

element.name: TZipper.Zip
element.short: Convenience method used to create a .zip file with the given name containing the specified file(s).

descr.p: Zip is a class procedure used to create a .zip file with the name specified in AZipFileName. Overloaded variants are provided that allow one or more file names to be specified using the AFileToBeZipped or AFileList arguments.
For example:

element.name: TZipper.Zip.AZipFileName
element.short: Name for the .zip file created in the method.

element.name: TZipper.Zip.AFileToBeZipped
element.short: Name of the file added to the .zip file.

element.name: TZipper.Zip.AFileList
element.short: Contains file names added to the .zip file.

element.name: TZipper.Clear
element.short: Removes all values in the Entries and Files properties.

element.name: TZipper.Terminate
element.short: Halts an assigned compressor in the class instance, and sets Terminated to True.

element.name: TZipper.BufferSize
element.short: Buffer size used when reading and processing files.

element.name: TZipper.OnPercent
element.short: Threshold percentage which triggers progress notifications when processing files.

element.name: TZipper.OnProgress
element.short: Event handler signalled to show a percent complete progress notifications.

element.name: TZipper.OnStartFile
element.short: Event handler signalled when compression for a file is started.

element.name: TZipper.OnEndFile
element.short: Event handler signalled when compression for a file has been completed.

element.name: TZipper.FileName
element.short: Name of the .ZIP archive file where the compressed files and directories are stored.

element.name: TZipper.FileComment
element.short: Comment stored in the .ZIP archive file.

element.name: TZipper.Files
element.short: Provides access to the list of files and directories in the archive.

descr.p: Deprecated. Use the Entries property to call its AddFileEntry or AddFileEntries methods instead.

element.name: TZipper.InMemSize
element.short: Total memory used for the compressed content in the .ZIP file.

element.name: TZipper.Entries
element.short: Collection with the TZipFileEntry instances in the .ZIP archive.

element.name: TZipper.Terminated
element.short: True if the Terminate method has been called.

element.name: TZipper.UseLanguageEncoding
element.descr: EFS/language encoding using UTF-8.

descr.p: TFullZipFileEntry is a TZipFileEntry descendant which provides additional information about files in a .ZIP archive. TFullZipFileEntry extends the ancestor class to include properties like:

dl.dd: General purpose bit flag from the Local Header in the .ZIP archive file.
Compression method for the file.
Size after applying the compression method and level.
32-bit CRC value for the file.

element.name: TFullZipFileEntry.BitFlags
element.short: General purpose bit flag from the Local Header in the .ZIP archive file.

element.name: TFullZipFileEntry.CompressedSize
element.short: Size after applying the compression method and level.

element.name: TOnCustomStreamEvent
element.short: Specifies an event handler signalled for stream actions in TUnZipper.

element.name: TOnCustomStreamEvent.Sender
element.short: TUnZipper object instance for the notification.

element.name: TCustomInputStreamEvent
element.short: Specifies an event handler signalled for actions to an input stream.

element.name: TCustomInputStreamEvent.Sender
element.short: TUnZipper object instance for the notification.

element.name: TUnZipper
element.short: Extracts and decompresses files and directories in a .ZIP archive file.

element.name: TUnZipper.UnZipAllFiles
element.short: Unzips all files in a zip file, writing them to disk.

descr.p: This procedure unzips all files in a object and writes the unzipped files to disk.
The example below unzips the files into "C:\windows\temp":

element.name: TUnZipper.UnZipAllFiles.AZipFileName
element.short: Name of the .zip file unzipped in the method.

element.name: TUnZipper.UnZipFile
element.short: Unzips a single file found in the specified .ZIP archive.

element.name: TUnZipper.UnZipFile.aExtractFileName
element.short: Name of the file to unzip in the method.

element.name: TUnZipper.UnZipFiles
element.short: Unzips the specified files in a .ZIP archive file.

element.name: TUnZipper.UnZipFiles.AZipFileName
element.short: Name of the .ZIP file to unzip.

element.name: TUnZipper.UnZipFiles.FileList
element.short: Stringlist containing one or more files to be unzipped.

element.name: TUnZipper.UnZipFiles.aFileList
element.short: Stringlist containing one or more files to be unzipped.

descr.p: UnZip is an overloaded class method used to unzip one or more files in the specified .ZIP archive file. Overloaded variants are provided which allow the file or files to be specified using RawByteString, Array, or TStrings data types.
UnZip is a convenience method, and does not require an instance of the class. It uses the default options to perform the unzip operation.

element.name: TUnZipper.Unzip.aExtractFileName
element.short: Name of a file or directory entry to extract in the method.

element.name: TUnZipper.Unzip.aFileList
element.short: List of file names to unzip in the method.

element.name: TUnZipper.Clear
element.short: Removes all entries and files from object.

element.name: TUnZipper.Examine
element.short: Opens zip file and reads the directory entries (list of zipped files).

element.name: TUnZipper.Terminate
element.short: Sets the value in Terminated to True.

element.name: TUnZipper.BufferSize
element.short: Size of the buffer used to read and decompress entries in the .ZIP file.

element.name: TUnZipper.OnOpenInputStream
element.short: Event handler signalled when the input stream for the .ZIP file is opened.

element.name: TUnZipper.OnCloseInputStream
element.short: Event handler signalled when the input stream for the .ZIP file is closed.

element.name: TUnZipper.OnCreateStream
element.short: Event handler signalled when an output stream is created.

element.name: TUnZipper.OnDoneStream
element.short: Event handler signalled when an output stream is closed.

element.name: TUnZipper.OnPercent
element.short: Threshold percentage which triggers a progress notification.

element.name: TUnZipper.OnProgress
element.short: Progress event handler used when decompressing files.

element.name: TUnZipper.OnProgressEx
element.short: Extended progress event handler used when decompressing files.

element.name: TUnZipper.OnStartFile
element.short: Callback procedure that will be called before unzipping a file.

element.name: TUnZipper.OnEndFile
element.short: Callback procedure that will be called after unzipping a file.

element.name: TUnZipper.FileName
element.short: Path and file name for the .zip file to be unzipped / processed.

element.name: TUnZipper.OutputPath
element.short: Path where archive files will be unzipped.

element.name: TUnZipper.FileComment
element.short: Comment stored in the .ZIP archive file.

element.name: TUnZipper.Files
element.descr: List of files that should be compressed in the zip file. Deprecated. Use Entries.AddFileEntry(FileName) or Entries.AddFileEntries(List) instead.

element.name: TUnZipper.Entries
element.short: Collection with TFullZipFileEntry instances for files and directories stored in the .ZIP archive.

descr.p: Entries is a read-only TFullZipFileEntries property, and the collection representing the items stored in the .ZIP archive file. Entries contains TFullZipFileEntry instances which represent the files or directories present in the .ZIP file.

Values in the Entries collection are created and stored when file directory in the .ZIP file is read. This can occur when the Examine method is called, or when extracting one or more files using the UnZipAllFiles / UnZipFiles / UnZipFile methods.
The items in the Entries collection are removed when the Clear method is called.

element.name: TUnZipper.UseUTF8
element.short: Indicates that the UTF-8-encoded names are used when locating and unzipping entries in the archive.

descr.p: UseUTF8 is a Boolean property which indicates if UTF-8-encoded names are used when locating and unzipping items stored in the .ZIP archive.

Each TZipFileEntry instance stored in the Entries collection has both UTF-8-encoded and RawByteString (same as AnsiString with no code page) variants of file or directory names. Set UseUTF8 to True to use the UTF-8-encoded version. The default value is False, and causes the RawByteString version to be used.
UseUTF8 is used when methods like UnZipAllFiles, UnZipFiles, and UnZipFile are called.

element.name: TUnZipper.Flat
element.short: Extracts files to a single directory.

descr.p: Enables flat extraction; like -j (also called junk paths) when using the unzip command-line utility. Directory structure(s) in the .zip file are not recreated, and files are extracted to the same directory.

element.name: TUnZipper.Terminated
element.short: True if the Terminate method has been called.

element.name: EZipError
element.short: Exception raised for errors in TZipper and TUnZipper.

element.name: TZipFileEntry.UTF8ArchiveFileName
element.descr: UTF8ArchiveFileName is the filename in UTF8-format. Use this if you need to have filenames with characters not in ASCII range.
